attributes.action: freeze business rates for small shops!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The business rates for small shops has now increased to a point that most small businesses can no longer afford them. They either go out of business or work from home. If we want to keep our interesing high streets then the government must act now. Our streets will soon be full of empty shop premises.
In Kensington Church st, London the rents on some shops is now lower than the rates. This can not continue! Please stop this tax on small business before it is too late. Please join this petition if you believe I am right.
